description: The rain drops and turns into grains of pearls. Shiroi usually hides inside and observes the humans coming and going.
effect: Increases self's DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>11/12/13/14/15/16%</color> and ignores <color=#82C65D>550/600/650/700/750/800</color> of enemy's Magic DEF; when self's HP falls below 50%, the effect of the weapon becomes reducing <color=#82C65D>11/12/13/14/15/16%</color> DMG taken and converting the DMG dealt by using skills into an equal amount of HP.
evolution: (Doll's current Evolution Level decreases the DMG taken by <color=#82C65D>0/1/2/3</color>%, increases the damage dealt by <color=#82C65D>0/1/2/3</color>%, and ignores <color=#82C65D>0/50/100/150</color> Magic DEF of the enemy)

name: Seduction
description: A hat favored by Nocturna. Nocturna has a lot of confidence in her fashion taste, even though it baffles many people.
effect: Increases self's Crit Chance by <color=#82C65D>11/12/13/14/15/16%</color>. If self has the Waxing Moon buff, Crit DMG increases by <color=#82C65D>22/24/26/28/30/32%</color>.
evolution: (Doll's current Evolution Level increases Crit Chance by <color=#82C65D>0/1/2/3</color>% and Crit DMG by <color=#82C65D>0/2/4/6</color>%)

name: Endless Spirit
description: A mysterious phantom floating around Auris.
effect: All allies take <color=#82C65D>11/12/13/14/15/16%</color> less damage for 60s after entering combat.
evolution: (Doll's current Evolution Level reduces DMG taken by <color=#82C65D>0/1/2/3</color>%)

name: Redemption
description: The staff given to Nicolis by the Holy Church leadership. A symbol of her role as a hierophant.
effect: Every use of Holy Boundary has a 50% chance of increasing Magic DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>5.5/6/6.5/7/7.5/8%</color>; stacks up to 5 times.
evolution: (Doll's current Evolution Level increases Magic DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>0/0.5/1/1.5</color>%)

name: Splendor
description: Danelim's favorite hair accessory. Even in the darkness of the night, it gives off a radiant glow.
effect: In the first 30s of combat, there is a <color=#82C65D>22/24/26/28/30/32%</color> chance to generate 1 Chaos Energy per second.
evolution: (Doll's current Evolution Level increases the chance to generate 1 Chaos Energy by <color=#82C65D>0/2/4/6</color>% per second)

name: Wispy Cloud
description: Light as the wind, wispy as smoke. Amane's favorite garment.
effect: Crit Chance increases by <color=#82C65D>11/12/13/14/15/16%</color>
evolution: (Doll's current Evolution Level increases Crit Chance by <color=#82C65D>0/1/2/3</color>%)

name: Odomera
description: A sword handed down over generations in the Kingdom of Lochaber. Reserved for the heir to the throne.
effect: After combat starts, ATK increases by <color=#82C65D>1.65/1.8/1.95/2.1/2.25/2.4%</color> every 5s, stacks up to 15 times.
evolution: (Evolving the current Character's Level will also increase an Attribute by <color=#82C65D>0/0.15/0.3/0.45</color>%)

name: Sweet Heartbeat
description: Snowshine's newly developed dessert. Popular among young people.
effect: Increases DMG Dealt of all allies by <color=#82C65D>1/2/3/4/5/6%</color>.
evolution: (Evolving the current Character's Level will also increase DMG by <color=#82C65D>0/1/2/3</color>%)

name: Heart Arrow
description: A ranged weapon infused with Geisha's thoughts.
effect: Every Crit landed reduces the enemy's Physical DEF by <color=#82C65D>5.5/6/6.5/7/7.5/8%</color>; stacks up to 5 times
evolution: (Doll's current Evolution Level decreases the enemy target's Physical DEF by <color=#82C65D>0/0.5/1/1.5</color>%)
